summary: Makes the weights for weapons more realistic.
descriptionHtml:
_______________________________________
Description:
_______________________________________
This mod does one small thing that is very unrealistic in the game, it changes the weapon weights. If you swing any sword that is over 8 pounds, you will throw your shoulder. (Trust me, I know). So why is it that in Skyrim, you can swing around an 18 pound sword indefinitely? This aims to fix that tiny little detail that Bethesda decided not to do. In the update history, it will say all of a certain kind of weapon, that means that every single weapon of that kind or that material type has been reweighted, including the enchanted versions.

_______________________________________
Versions and Updates:
_______________________________________
Version 1- Initial release. Reweights all of the weapons in the game
Version 1w- Patch for Weapons of the Third Era, all of the weapons are reweighted. Weapons of the Third Era is still required for this!!!! Get it here [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3871]Weapons of the Third Era[/url]

_______________________________________
Credits:
_______________________________________
G-d for creating us
Bethesda for Skyrim
